name: Hugo Blog Development
postCreateCommand: sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install -y wget && wget -q https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.151.0/hugo_extended_0.151.0_linux-amd64.deb && sudo dpkg -i hugo_extended_0.151.0_linux-amd64.deb && rm hugo_extended_0.151.0_linux-amd64.deb && git config --global --add safe.directory /workspaces/blog && sudo chown -R vscode:vscode /workspaces/blog && chmod -R 755 /workspaces/blog/public && hugo version
